tool_description: News about climate change from sources all over the world.
name: Ocean Assist
title: Ocean Assist

api_list.name: Climate News From Source
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about climate change from all over the world from a particular source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ocean-assist.p.rapidapi.com/climate/nyp"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ocean-assist.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ocean-assist.p.rapidapi.com/climate/{sourceid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ocean-assist.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
